name: Rodrigo Queiroz
about: I have been in the software development market since 2017, self-taught, specialized in Web and mobile Frontend with React and React Native, and with knowledge in backend with Node.js. I focus on creating high-performance solutions and exceptional user experiences, efficiently integrating the different layers of a project. I am always looking for innovation and ready to add value to teams with modern and scalable solutions. Here you will find information such as my professional experiences, projects, contact and more.
headline: Frontend Developer React, React Native, Javascript, Typescript
